ProjectTitle: Engineering superior microbial chassis strains and monoterpene synthases for highly efficient monoterpene production - FWO Research Project G0E8222N
InitialFeedbackHistory:
18/07/2022
2. Data; 7. Sharing: you don't have to include manuscripts and publications, a DMP focuses on the data underlying your publications. 
5. Storage: do you have a specific reason to use dropbox instead of a KU Leuven storage solution? You can find these in the storage guide (https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/nl), for example the 2TB onedrive linked to your account that you can use with no extra costs. Please address only the storage that you actually use in the follow up questions. 
6. Preservation: please note that the KU Leuven RDM policy asks 10 years of data preservation (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy) 
7. Sharing: please note that you can now also use KU Leuven RDR to preserve and share data (for which there is no suitable disciplinary repository) www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
